description: A rather unique, non-copyleft license that defines a mediated way to transfer stewardship of software that is not currently maintained to a new user. You have to label changed parts of the software as such.

permissions.name: Commercial Use
permissions.description: License material and derivatives can be used for commercial use

permissions.name: Sublicense
permissions.description: Describes the ability for you to grant/extend a license to the software

conditions.name: Disclose Source
conditions.description: Source code must be distributed when license material is published

conditions.name: License and Copyright Notice
conditions.description: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the license material

conditions.name: State Changes
conditions.description: Changes made to the licensed material must be documented

limitations.name: Trademark use
limitations.description: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant trademark rights, even though licenses without such a statement probably do not grant any implicit trademark rights.

limitations.name: Liability
limitations.description: License includes a limitation of liability
